eu.wauz.wauzcore.data.api

Class PlayerMetaConfigurationUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.wauz.wauzcore.data.api.PlayerMetaConfigurationUtils
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    GuildConfigurator, PlayerQuestConfigurator, PlayerRelationConfigurator

    public class PlayerMetaConfigurationUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Collection of methods for reading and writing data in player config files.
    Author:
    Wauzmons
